title: Are Everglow, (G)-IDLE, Itzy, Oneus, Stray Kids, Ateez, and TXT from the 4th generation K-pop group? - Quora

response.answer_text: (G)-IDLE, Itzy, Oneus, Stray Kids, Ateez, and Tomorrow X Together are half 4th and half 3rd. The groups made in 2019–2020 are 4th generation. From this list Tomorrow X Together, Itzy, Oneus, Everglow. Stray kids, (G)-IDLE and Ateez are half 3rd and half 4th generation. here are some pictures to bless your eyes ATEEZ  EVERGLOW  (G)-IDLE  ITZY  ONEUS  STRAYKIDS  TOMORROW X TOGETHER *swoon*  ~ I hope this helped ~
